description: Two's company, three's a crowd, four's a party, and five's a...gangbang??  It's tough to keep track of who's who when Justin Ryder, Christian Wilde, Marcus Mojo, Dylan McLovin, and Aaron Skyline join forces to suck and fuck like it's goin' out of style.  These boys come out horny and don't stop until the very end.  And right about the time you start wondering who's gonna clean up all the cum, the hairy Justin Ryder gladly assumes the role of pivot man in the hottest fuck fest you've seen yet.  Enjoy!
title: Hottest Fuck Fest
